title: Re-add sequential message IDs to all messages

requirements.summary: Display the message ID in the MessageBubble component for all messages, styled to match 4chan's post numbering system appearance
acceptanceCriteria: The message ID is visible in every message bubble
The ID is displayed near the timestamp or username
The styling is consistent with the rest of the message header

file_operations.description: Add message ID display to the MessageBubble component header, positioned near the timestamp. The ID should be rendered in a monospace font (font-mono) with muted styling similar to the timestamp. Display format: 'No. {message.id}' positioned between the username and timestamp in the message header. Ensure the ID is visible for all message types including creator posts, regular messages, and replies.
